title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 419.14 - Transition period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 419.14 - Transition period

State Regulations
(a) For 90 days including and following the
effective date of this Part, persons servicing mortgage loans shall not be in
violation of this Part if they comply with this Part that was in effect, by
emergency rulemaking, on the effective date of this regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
419.14

Amended

New

York State Register December 18, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 51, eff. 12/18/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
